name: Rudy Bartolome
offering: Article Marketing, Branding, Content Creation, Content Marketing, E-Commerce Marketing, Facebook Ads, Google Ads, SEO, SEO (Local), SEO Tools, SEO Training, Shoppingcarts
what_you_do: The No B.S. SEO Bootcamp is a 7-week course designed to teach individuals how to effectively manage their SEO efforts, whether they choose to do it themselves or hire professionals.
who_you_serve: The course is aimed at purpose-driven entrepreneurs, solopreneurs, coaches, creators, and small business owners who want to improve their online visibility without becoming SEO experts.
bio: Testimonials from participants indicating increased confidence in managing SEO and hiring help.
business_focus: The No B.S. SEO Bootcamp is a 7-week course designed to teach individuals how to effectively manage their SEO efforts, whether they choose to do it themselves or hire professionals. (SEO education)
